com.streambase.sbunit.ext
Class BasicErrorReport

java.lang.Object
  com.streambase.sbunit.ext.BasicErrorReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorReport
public class BasicErrorReport
extends java.lang.Object
implements ErrorReport

A simple English error report that uses JSON to represent Tuples and ExpectTuplesFailure for reporting errors.

Constructor Summary
BasicErrorReport(java.lang.String header)
          Create an empty error report.
